prompts.prompt: I need an app that functions as a chatbot. This chatbot should provide detailed information about industrial balancing. The application should include a user-friendly interface where users can ask questions and receive responses about various aspects of industrial balancing, such as its principles, techniques, equipment used, and applications in different industries. The app should have a knowledge base that contains comprehensive information about industrial balancing. The chatbot should be able to handle common queries and provide informative responses.
